page.title: 14Paper Mill farm.
page.content: When the Plague was in London in 1346 the cloth was brought here. They found out that it spread the plague.They burnt it and then buried it around the mill. A few years later there was a fire and the mill was burnt down and the only thing left was the mill stone but that is under water.There are some mill stones dotted around the stables and fields at Paper Mill Farm. In the summer the river is quiet. THE FARM Paper Mill Farm is a Stud Farm.Miss Redbart and her father live at the farm with the farm manager. The studding is done at a particular time of year from April to June. They have two Stallions,ten Stud horses and nine show jumpers. They have 88 acres of land and it is very quiet.On the farm it is very hard work but fun.
